LanguageData.EnableIndicatorNeutralFactions: Enable damage indicators for neutral faction
LanguageData.EnableIndicatorNeutralFactions_Desc: Damage indicators will show for things of neutral faction. Default is no.
LanguageData.DisplayPawnsOnly: Only show damage indicators for pawns
LanguageData.DisplayPawnsOnly_Desc: Damage indicators will not show when hitting buildings, and other non-pawn objects.
